Steps.Message: Update at 00:11 - We know the timeframe we initially estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to repair our overhead network in Lower Road. As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop, and contact us with an update. We are really sorry you have been impacted tonight and we will provide a further update as soon as possible.

We became aware of this power cut at 21:48. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Logs.Comment: Update at 00:11 - We know the timeframe we initially estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to repair our overhead network in Lower Road. As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop, and contact us with an update. We are really sorry you have been impacted tonight and we will provide a further update as soon as possible.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We had to turn off power in your area so our engineers could safely carry out emergency repairs to the network.
